name: Normal Train Game
description:
Just a regular ride on a normal train.

- WASD to move around

- Left Click to interact with objects, pick up items, and open doors

- Right Click to zoom

Made for the Global Game Jame 2018.  The Global Game Jam is an annual even where small teams get together to make a game from scratch in under 48 hours. The theme of this year was "Transmission".

Made By:

David Eichmann

Michael Gillon

Craig Innes

David Strachan
